stories.title: Hover Over Main Item to Display Sub Items
stories.description: As a user, I want to hover over 'Main Item 2' so that I can see its corresponding 'Sub Item'

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the Menu is displayed, When I hover over 'Main Item 2', Then 'Sub Item' and 'SUB SUB LIST' should become visible

stories.title: Hover Over Sub Item to Display Sub Sub Items
stories.description: As a user, I want to hover over 'SUB SUB LIST' so that I can see its corresponding 'Sub Sub Item'

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given 'Sub Item' is visible, When I hover over 'SUB SUB LIST', Then 'Sub Sub Item 1' and 'Sub Sub Item 2' should become visible
